title: Random Round
desc:
Post 25
- Roll a d6.
• 1: Target learns what the 2 top rounds are.
• 2: Target restores 1 <:charge:1240849067362488403>.
• 3: Host posts a hamster gif.
• 4: Deal 1 damage to target.
• 5: Deal 2 damage to target.
• 6: Deal 3 damage to target.
- **Safe** on a 1, 2 or 3 roll.
